reviewText: This movie makes me want to dance. I just love the meaning to the movie. Very happy with my purchase.
Love the Forbidden Dance is Lambada.  Not too keen on Dance with Me.
Searched high and low for this was so happy to find it haven't seen it in years.
both movies is exactly what I wanted.  I watch it all the time in the conveinece of my home w/my family.
I always loved this movie as a child. Always watched it on HBO. Too happy to find it on DVD.
I was very happy when I seen this been looking for it for a long time and have watched it twice I am just excited I get to own it and can watch it whenever

The Forbidden Dance wasn't a great movie at all had the plot been better it could of been a great movie. The only thing that makes this movie one to remember is the dancing. Dance with me is a good movie. I would of like to of seen the son from Cuba do more dancing on his own.
I love the forbidden dance. For my family its a family movie filled with memories. :) and then dance with me was just a bonus.
it was a good to watch my all time favorite dance movies without rewinding again and again on a dvd

THES MOVIES WERE MY FAVIOTE MOVIES I ALWAYS LOVE THEM AND THEY DID MAKE WANT TO GET UP AND DANCE AND I LEARN DO THEM WATCHING THEM SO I KNEW HOW TO WHEN I WENT TO A SCHOOL AND DID'T MAKE A FOOL OF MYSELF.
I watched this movie when I was a teenager. At one point I had parts memorized. I always wished I could dance like them! Full of action, and sex appeal! Good movie!
